reviews.comments: Excelente ubicación, servicio y muy amables!

Muy lindoy súper cómodo.
Martín siempre en contacto y preocupado por brindar una buena estadia
El depto es tal cual lo publicado. Martín estuvo siempre disponible y atento. Muchas gracias!
El departamento es càlido y còmodo, muy buena ubicaciòn cerca de lugares de esparcimiento y compras, cercano a medios de transporte. Muy buena recepciòn...
Todo perfecto y amable.
El departamento coincide con las fotos publicadas. La zona es excelente, hay mucha variedad. Muy cómoda la habitación y el sofa cama. La cocina está equipada y con condimientos para cocinar.
Excelente depto para tres. excelente ubicación,  en el corazon de palermo soho y cerca de todos los medios de transporte. cochera a la vuelta. Todo tal cual se muestra en las fotos!
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias por tus comentarios. Especialmente los comentarios privados que nos ayudan mucho a mejorar. Ya se recambió todo! :)
Saludos!

reviews.comments:
Muy recomendado, mejor ubicación y cerca de todo! 
Muchisimas Gracias por sentirnos seguros y cómodos! increíble! 
Gracias!!! de parte de Evan y yo

el departamento esta adecuadamente equipado, se ubica en una zona estratégica tanto si uno va por negocios (es accesible a diferentes zonas de la Capital como zona norte) como si va de paseo.
Palermo Soho es un lugar que tiene vida nocturna tranquila y con excelente propuesta de bares, restoranes y comercio de ropa y calzado.
Esta propiedad esta muy cerca de todos estos lugares.
La zona se percibe segura y se puede salir en horas nocturnas sin problemas.
Muy lindo y cómodo!! Todo estuvo bien : )

Excelente la atención, realmente se preocupan por la estadía de sus huéspedes. Equipamiento de buena calidad, prolijo, etc. Lo mejor que hemos visto y para destacar, es que no pretenden hacerse ricos con 3 noches, buen precio.

Martin estuvo todo el tiempo pendiente de nuestra llegada y de la comodidad en nuestro alojamiento. El barrio es inmejorable y todo lo publicado responde a la realidad del alojamiento. Volvería a alojarme aqui!!!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Vilma!!!

reviews.comments: Todo espectacular, tal cual se muestra en las fotos. Martín fue atento y nos ubicó muy bien en la zona. Quedamos muy conformes y volveríamos sin dudarlo! Gracias por todo Martín..
Todo bien excepto el apuro de Martin en reírme para poder irse.  Le faltó una toalla de mano ya que eramos 3 personas y solo eran 2 toallas
reviews.response:
Sebastían, lamento que evalúes mi cantidad de sonrisa. Amén de tu llegada tres horas tarde, no tenía ningún apuro por irme, de hecho los recibí personalmente, les mostré todo el departamento, les indiqué como moverse en transporte público facilitándoles una tarjeta sube con dinero y les indiqué como ir hasta el la sucursal de la Embajada de EEUU. Asimismo, les posibilité un late check out sin ningún costo extra.
Generalmente busco un equilibrio de tiempo al recibir a las personas para que puedan tener toda la información necesaria y también relajarse tranquilos en el departamento ya que suelen venir cansados del viaje... 
Seguramente en tu próximo viaje, podrás ampliar tu presupuesto y probar con alguna cadena de Hoteles en donde cuentan con personas las 24hs en el lobby a las cuales le pagan para que que de esa manera, clientes como vos no sienten "el apuro en reirse para poder irse"
Lamento que haya faltado una toalla de mano, solamente necesitaban avisarme por teléfono (del cual has hecho bastante uso para consultarnos) y lo solucionaba.

reviews.comments: Me sentí como en mi propia casa, su dueño es muy atento y cordial y el barrio es tranquilo y seguro
reviews.response: Muchas gracias!!

reviews.comments:
Hermoso departamento, luminoso, amplio, con lindos detalles de bienvenida que nos prepararon Martin y Natalia. La ubicación es perfecta para moverse a pie por la zona o en transporte hacia otros lugares.  Fue nuestra primer experiencia en airbnb y desde que llegamos nos sentimos muy cómodos. Todas las remodelaciones del departamento hacen que parezca a estrenar. 

Saludos y muchas gracias!
reviews.response: Andrea y Pablo son una pareja muy agradable! Dejaron el departamento en muy buenas condiciones, muy limpio y ordenado. Siempre disponibles y respetuosos. Un placer tener una pareja tan linda! :) espero verlos por buenos aires nuevamente. Serán muy bienvenidos!

reviews.comments: Excelente lugar, cerca de todo. La comunicación fue fácil y correcta. El apartamento tiene todo lo necesario. Recomendado.

Martin fue muy amable y servicial en todo momento. Se puso en contacto al hacer la reserva y le hizo seguimiento hasta el momento de la llegada.
Surgió una duda durante la estancia y respondió rápido.
Ubicación, barrio, perfecto, ideal para visitar B.A.
En líneas generales el departamento está muy bien. Recomendación para los futuros huéspedes acordar y coordinar bien los términos con antelación y no dejar para último momento.
Buen espacio, limpio, bien equipado. Excelente ubicación, a 4-5 cuadras del subte y cercano a polos gastronómicos y de entretenimiento. Tuvimos una grata estadía en el departamento de Martin.

El departamento de Martín es un lugar muy cómodo para pasar buen tiempo en Palermo y otros barrios de la ciudad.  Todo era en orden y de acuerdo con las fotos. Martín es un excelente anfitrón que esta siempre listo para ayudar cualquier tiempo sea necesario. 

Recomiendo mucho este departamento especialmente a alguienes que planean alojarse en Palermo.

Muy buena ubicación, excelente sector, buenos restaurantes y cercanos a lugares de interés. El departamento muy cómodo, suficiente espacio, buena luz, seguro y muy bien diseñado. Un lugar en se logra una muy buena estadía.

Yo y mi familia tuvimos una gran estancia y pudimos contar con la ayuda y el contacto de Martin cuando lo necesitábamos. El apartamento es genial, aunque es exactamente como las fotos muestran, pero sí sorprende. Excelente ubicación en uno de los mejores barrios de la ciudad. ¡Recomiendo!
Muy buena ubicación, muy limpio todo, excelente
Excelente estadía!
Lindo apartamento tal cual las fotos. Ubicación excelente

Todo resulto muy bien en nuestra estadía en el departamento. Es muy lindo, tal cual aparece en las imágenes y tiene una muy buena ubicación. Si bien no pude conocer a Martin y Natalia, ellos se preocuparon de que todo funcionara bien y de darnos consejos.

La experiencia en el departamento de Martin ha sido muy buena, todo estaba tal cual lo ofrecio y el estuvo atento a cualquier necesidad que pudiesemos tener. El departamento es lindo, la zona centrica. ¡Muy recomendable!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por su visita y sus comentarios!!!

reviews.comments:
El apartamento es muy cómodo tal cual se muestra en las fotos.
Esta excelentemente ubicado y el servicio y calidad de quien te recibe es excelente.
Martin fue muy dispuesto 
Todo excelente seguro volveremos pronto!!
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias chicos! ponemos mucho esfuerzo en que todo salgo bien!
Esperamos contar con Uds. nuevamente!

reviews.comments:
Lo primero que tengo que decir es que el departamento era tal cual como aparecía en más fotos y eso se agradece. 
El departamento cumplió con todas las expectativas: buena ubicación, limpio y con todas las comodidades que uno necesita. 
Por último, mencionar que Martín - el anfitrión - nos recibió muy bien, muy amable y muy dispuesto a solucionar cualquier problema que tuviéramos. 
En resumen, lo recomiendo y volvería de todas maneras.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Loreto!!! esperamos que vuelvas!

reviews.comments:
Me gustó mucho el departamento! Me sentí realmente como en casa. Es un departamento muy cómodo, con una ubicación privilegiada! Aún con frío, el balcón es ideal para disfrutar de un café o vinos con amigos! 
Como el objetivo de mi viaje era descansar, comer y beber, la ubicación fue perfecta, hay restaurantes, bares y supermercados cerca. 
Martín fue muy buen anfitrión y el check in y check out fueron muy prácticos.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu visita Franklin!!!

reviews.comments: El apartamento es cómodo y muy buen ubicado con todo lo necesario para poder pasar una buena estadía en la ciudad. A pocas cuadras de locales comerciales y lugares para comer. Los días que me tocaron fueron extremadamente fríos y el apto estaba muy bien acondicionado. El contacto con Martín fue fluido y rápido.
reviews.response:
Pablo, muchas gracias por tus comentarios y me alegro que no hayan tenido frío! Justo habíamos agregado un panel extra en el cuarto por si era necesario.
Saludos y te esperamos nuevamente!

reviews.comments: El departamento es muy cómodo, limpio y agradable, tiene todo lo necesario. Bonita iluminación lo hace muy acogedor. Bien ubicado, a cuadras de subte y avenidas principales.
reviews.response: Alejandra, muchas gracias por tu visita y por tus comentarios! Esperamos que vuelvas

reviews.comments: The apartment is in a fantastic location roughly midway between the subway and the shops & restaurants of Palermo Soho.  It's about a 10 minute walk to the subway and maybe 5-6 to the middle of the neighborhood.  The bed is quite firm and you do get a good amount of street noise in the bedroom due to being on a lower floor of the building but it's not terrible by any means.  The apartment itself is well decorated and quite pleasant to hang out in.  I would stay here again for sure!

I highly recommend Martin's apartment. 
The location is great, right in the exciting Palermo Soho neighborhood, and the apartment is very nice to stay in. 
The apartment and especially the kitchen is very well equipped. 
Martin as a host is very forthcoming and answers any question you may have swiftly.
Great location, Martin was very communicative and helpful, kitchen was well-equipped.

The apartment is perfect for two people. Located close to everything, the host was really responsive, and everything worked great. 
Definitely would consider staying here again!

Very nice apartment and excellent location, right in the heart of Palermo. Smart, well equipped, clean, with nice thick towels, comfortable bed and a good shower. Although we are not big fans of AC, we were very glad to have it, as it was really hot outside during our stay. Good WiFi and cable, too. We also really appreciated the cool, thoughtful touches such as spices, plug adapters, maps, magazines, etc.
Martin was very good at communicating with us before, during and after our stay and Monica was very sweet checking us in and out.
Although the street was a bit noisy at certain hours, closing the windows did the trick for us.
Apartamento maravilhoso, local agradavel, boa recepção, igualzinho está no site. Agradecemos muito

Wonderful location close to tons of bars, restaurants and shopping. The neighborhood felt very safe even at night. Martin was so easy to communicate with and made checking in and out very easy and was also available for questions or recommendations. Highly recommend!
Great place and walkable to shops and restaurants!

Staying at Martin's Airbnb was the best decision we could have made for our trip. From top to bottom, every part of the experience was top-notch. For starters, even before we arrived to Bs. As., Martin was responsive and extremely helpful with managing our arrival. Monica, the building's manager (of sorts) was available to give us the key as soon as we arrived at the door, and Martin was consistently helpful in providing great answers to some basic questions (like where to find good empanadas, how to exchange money, etc.). On top of that, the location, in the heart of Palermo Soho, is really unbeatable. We were within a few blocks of some of the best nightlife and restaurants in the whole city--a convenient walk to several supermarkets, easy access to public transport (buses and Subte). Life at the apartment was just plain easy!

Staying at Martin's truly made our stay in Buenos Aires much better. He is a great host and a great guy. Looking forward to coming back!
O apartamento é do jeito que está nas fotos, o seu grande diferencial é a excelente localização. Voltarei com certeza!

The apartment is great. The location is a winner: safe, beautiful, unique area with tons of great restaurants and cafes and has many public transportation lines available. Martin was more than a great host and made extra few miles to help me with various things. The only downside is that the bedroom is a bit noisy during the day (at night it’s fine) so if you’re sensitive to noise and wanna take naps take this into consideration. All in all - lovely apartment, great host, perfect location. Highly recommended.

The apartment is located in a perfect location, easy access to lots and lots of bars and restaurants. We walked everywhere we needed to. The subway and bus system on Santa Fe was right there for longer trips around the city. The place is cozy and clean and has everything we needed. Martin was a great host, easy and quick communication. Everything went off without a hitch. Would recommend staying here for sure.
Excelente apartamento! Muito bem localizado
Location is everything! Martins place was perfectly central in Palermo SoHo, close to everything, and very clean. Would definitely recommend it.

L appartement de Martin est tres agreable. bien equipe, plus lumineux que sur les photos, et le quartier assez anime, surtout le soir. En l absence de Martin, c est la concierge qui nous a recues pour la remise des clefs et elle a repondu a toutes nos questions (en espagnol).

O apartamento é muito bom,tudo funcionando perfeitamente,me senti segura,bairro tranquilo e familiar.Martim foi atencioso quando precisei de ajuda com a tv,foi flexivél na entrega das chaves,recomendo.

Martin's apartment is very well located, and the apartment is really cozy and beautiful. We didn't have time to use the balcony, but maybe we will go back to use it! Nice coffee shops close by, and cool restaurants 5 minutes away. We had a really nice stay.

Martin was very responsive as a host and his apartment is located in the chic and trendy Palermo, close to various excellent restaurants and  shops and close to the subte. We were three and it was spacious enough for all of us. The good sense of decoration is also a plus. We hope to come back!
Martin was extremely flexible and accomodating and friendly- a great host!

Adoramos !!!! Apartamento aconchegante e de boa localização. Estava muito frio e  o aquecimento funcionando perfeitamente.  
O anfitrião sempre atencioso!!!
Td ótimo!!!! Com certeza voltaremos!!!!!

It felt just like being at home. The apartment was clean, cozy and centric. It had all the equipment for a very pleasant stay (kitchen equipment and so forth). Martin and Natalia were very responsive and nice. They made sure we had everything we needed.

We had a fantastic stay. The apartment is centrally located, great neighbourhood! Above everything the host is amazing. Made us feel so welcome and even helped us locate a phone that was lost in a taxi. Would stay here again any day!

Our stay at Martin and Natalia's place was wonderful. They are very welcoming and ready to help. The place is very simple but elegant, and there's everything you may need. This was first Airbnb experience for my mother and she's very excited!
Great location - just a 5 minute walk from the shops & restaurants of Palermo Soho.  Martin was a great host & made sure he was on hand to answer any questions.   Recommended - thank you Martin!

As fotos do anúncio reproduzem fielmente o que você encontrará no apartamento do Martin! Boa estrutura na cozinha e os cômodos exatamente como apresentados aqui no anúncio. O bairro é um espetáculo à parte! Walking distance de diversos pontos interessantes, restaurantes e bares. Caminhamos curtindo muito o bairro! Destaque para o café da manhã no Cocu e Panera Rosa, almoço no Don Julio e Drinks do Verne Club (tudo aproveitamos a pé). Próximo ao metrô! O prédio não é muito moderno, mas nada que atrapalhe a estadia. Tudo maravilhoso, obrigada Martin (sempre acessível quando precisei!) nos sentimos em casa nesses 9 dias de estadia e já queremos voltar!

This was my first airbnb stay. I was super satisfied. Martin was an excellent host and happy to help with tips and advice and easily contactable. I stayed for a week and it was a great base to explore the Palermo neighbourhood - I walked everywhere. My mission was to absorb the culture and try and live like a local - easily achieved! So many cafes and restaurants to choose from. 
As it is so close to everything, light sleepers may be deterred as you are so close to all the action which continues to the early hours of the morning - for me that was part of the attraction. 
I would certainly stay here again.
Thanks Martin

Martin's home is as pictured! It's updated, comfortable, roomy enough for two, with many nearby conveniences. Enjoy a cup of coffee on the cozy patio in the morning or a glass of wine in the evening. Be sure to get daily fresh fruit from the corner market across on Guatemala or small staple items across Malabia. 

We found walking or taxis to be our mode for travel and both were easy to do. The location is well known to taxis and we were able to get to some locations by foot - such as the famous Don Julio's and wonderful gelato, as well as the Evita Museum. TIP: If you don't speak Spanish and are taking taxis to your destinations, write out the address (street first, then number) to hand to your driver. This will ease communication for both parties.

Creature comforts matter during a week long stay - and Martin's home has them. The bathroom has great counter space for two and wonderful water pressure from the shower head. The bed was comfortable and we enjoyed having the fan overhead to cool and to create a bit of white noise. Amply equipped, the kitchen was all we needed as most meals were taken away. But it seemed well stocked to do some light cooking. Seating is everywhere - stools, chairs, and futon with level space to eat, place your laptop, or store travel gear. Outlets are in abundance. The building caretakers are very friendly and make you feel comfortable as a guest. And even small things are in place, such as hooks to store the keys when not in use.


.
Great location and hosting! I do recommend it.

My friend and I really enjoyed our stay at Martin's place! It was in a prime location, and the apartment itself was a nice size, and very clean. When we got there, we met Monica and her daughter who helped us get all set up. Her daughter translated everything to us in English. They were both so enthusiastic and kind. 

When we checked in, however, Monica mentioned that they had been having some issues with the toilet. For the last two days of our stay, the toilet did not flush at all. We informed Martin of this as we left, and he said he would get it fixed immediately. We probably should have said something to Monica, but it would have been difficult to translate. 

The wifi was also not working when we arrived, but Martin informed us of that in advance and had it fixed within the day. I've never had a better AirBNB host--one who was as responsive or helpful. I definitely would recommend!

Great place! Cozy and with good location in Buenos Aires, close to supermarket, restaurants, ice cream shop, subway and buses. Communication with Martin was fast and easy. Monica and her family were very helpful and friendly and help us in everything we needed. Unfortunately there was a problem with the internet equipment and then we did not have Wi-Fi during our stay. Apart from that, in overall we enjoyed a lot our stay :)

The communication was great, Martin checked in with us even though he is in the states.  Monica and her daughter were very helpful and friendly.  Unfortunately there was an issue with the internet in the street so we were unable to have wifi during our stay but that was obviously out of their control.  Overall a good experience and a very cute apartment, I slept comfortably on the fold out bed however my parents found their bed quite hard.
The location was great - close to good places to eat, drink etc!

Martin's apartment was perfectly located for us. Communication with Martin was great before arrival and Nathalia met us and let us in, thankfully early as we arrived on a very early flight. She gave us a great welcome and it was nice chatting to her. The apartment is nicely decorated and perfect for two. There were a few problems with the bathroom etc but I'm sure they will be fixed for the next guests. Thank you both for a wonderful introduction to Buenos Aires!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in this unit. Very convenient to supermarkets, Don Julio Parilla (just 3 blocks away), La Choza Parrilla (our favourite), a great ice cream shop and various bars and delicatessens and laundries. Subway (metro) and buses not far away and the radio taxis frequent the street, so very easy for getting around. Palermo Soho is a great neighbourhood with loads of food options. The unit is very nicely decorated and homely. Wifi was great and there is a lift. Taxi from Jorge Newberry cost approx. 150 ARS (took about 20 minutes) and approx 52,500 ARS to the International airport 20kms out of town (allow at least 1 hr). Thanks very much for a very enjoyable stay. Easy communication using (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) and email.

Super bien placé, dans un quartier mignon et agréable, l'appartement est parfait pour un séjour à Buenos Aires. Joli et bien équipé je recommande vivement, d'autant que Martin et natalia sont très réactifs et aimables.

A great little apartment, well-equipped with everything needed for an enjoyable and comfortable stay. The location of the apartment was perfect, situated close to all the attractions of the buzzing Palermo neighbourhood. Martin was also easy to deal with as a host and accommodating. Would recommend to other travellers!

Awesome place and awesome hosts! Natalia lent us a few hundred pesos to get situated with a subway card when we arrived as we hadn't exchanged any currency yet. Martin went out of his way to print and deliver some bus tickets as well. We had a slight issue with the toilet but the building supervisor was up within 3 minutes to take care of it! Highly recommend staying with them. Also bed was extremely comfortable.

Everything was great, Natalia and Martin were amazing hosts. We were able to check in way earlier and get some useful recommendations for the neighborhood. The flat is in excellent shape, you have a nice balcony and are right in the middle in Palermo. After exploring Buenos Aires, I can understand why many people consider it the best area to stay. Highly recommended!

Location Location Location! I fell in love with this apartment. Steps away from the busy part of Palermo Soho and walking distance to a park, restaurants, laundromat, grocery stores, subway, bars and a neighborhood filled with amazing street art. There's also a really friendly corner cafe a block down the street that became my "Cheers"-like place. What I loved the most about this place was the balcony that overlooks a corner but is also privately shaded by a beautiful tree. I had breakfast out there every single morning. The place is cozy cute for a couple and a perfect for a solo traveler (like me) who wanted to integrate themselves into a neighborhood like a local, and also great for a runner (like me) who wanted to run through a neighborhood to get to know it, but also wanted to run along avenues like I did running from this place to around the Botanical Garden and the Plaza Italia. Good WiFi, quiet neighbors in the building, and if you're a city sleeper you'll love this place just fine. Plus Martin & Natalia are super friendly and were so helpful and quickly communicative. Just book it!

This is truly the perfect place in Buenos Aires, perfectly located in my new favorite neighborhood Palermo Soho. The apartment has all the amenities you might need, is super clean and most of all Martin and Natalia were so welcoming and helpful!
Apartamento ótimo com tudo perfeito e funcionando...Gostamos muito, perto de (URL HIDDEN) recomendo e se der...volto para Buenos Aires neste apartamento.

We had a perfect stay at Martin's place in Palermo Soho. Location is great - about 7 minutes walk to the nearest subway line, and more importantly, 4 minutes door-to-door to one of the best parilla steakhouses in BA, Don Julio :) Martin was an awesome host - he was very welcoming, extremely helpful, friendly, and able to communicate with us in excellent English, which we greatly appreciated. He responded very quickly via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) and the AirBnB app, and always provided clear and helpful information, both before and during our stay. He and Natalia gave us great restaurant recommendations, helpful tips about taxi prices, etc. The apartment is great - excellent air conditioning, clean rooms, and kitchen stocked with a bottle of Malbec as a welcoming gift. Highly recommend!

Martin and Natalia were fantastic hosts! Very friendly and hospitable:) Check-in was super flexible and they gave us a lot of information about the city/Palermo area, when giving us the key. They were also super available throughout the trip for any questions. The apartment was super cute and we would definitely come back:)

I can't say enough great things about this place! It was absolutely perfect for myself, my boyfriend and our friend. The apartment is stylish, clean, well equipped, which is great because we made several meals there after visiting nearby markets (which I highly recommend) to try local cuisine and live like a local. Martin went above and beyond, recommending lots of fantastic local places and was super responsive through text. He has great taste, as evinced by both the apt and recommendations. If you want to see Palermo,this is the place as it's situated near everything you want to be--so many top restaurants (try Las cabreras for steak and hormiga for lunch!), markets and specialty stores, plazas, coffee shops and bars. Could not have had a more magical experience!

Thanks to our wonderful hosts Nati and Martin! You were just perfect! Despite our late  arrival due to our flight flight delay, you gave us a friendly and warm welcome and we immediately felt at home! The apartment and location are great! We just wish we would have stayed longer!

Martin and Natalia are great hosts. They gave us such a warm welcome, showing us the flat and giving us tips for places to eat and grab groceries. The apartment is simply furnished - just a futon, table and chairs really. It's all we needed (and A/C... the A/C was a blessing), but others might want some more seating or something. The one downside was the bed. It's extremely hard and squeaky! We were ok with it, but if you like soft beds or wake up easily, this is not the bed for you. 

Other than that it's a great place -- very secure and private. And of course, it's in a fantastic spot; Palermo Soho is lively, fun, and super walkable.
reviews.response:
Alison, thank you for your visit!! We will check the bed. The mattress is hard because is "back care" we have people that loves it and people that prefers a softer one... but there's only one bed!!! 
Thanks for your coments and hope to see you back in the city.

reviews.comments: Ótima localização, região excelente para se hospedar em Buenos Aires, com muitas opções de bons bares e restaurantes nas proximidades. O prédio é um pouco antigo, mas o apartamento é limpo, possui wi-fi eficiente, ar condicionado e tv a cabo. Martin e Natalia cuidaram para que o check in e o check out fossem feitos sem qualquer problema.
Martin was a great host and the apartment had a fantastic location to explore Palermo.

The highlight of Martin's flat aside from it's central location was the little balcony where we could sit and enjoy the being in the trees while the world went on below us.  Martin and Natalia were the perfect hosts, full of helpful tips for enjoying their beautiful city.

We had a great stay at Martin and Natalia's place in Buenos Aires. It's situated right in the center of Palermo Soho neighborhood of Buenos Aires and is safe, elegant and close to the amazing nightlife. 

Natalia and Martin made sure our check in was smooth. The house has a nice clean and cozy feel to it. They provided us with all the info we needed to enjoy our stay in BA - bars, restaurants, markets, popular spots and of course tango ! 

The communication from them was great and they helped our stay to be as lovely as possible. Would definitely stay here again while visiting Buenos Aires and would highly recommend their place for anyone visiting BA.

Thank you Natalia and Martin !
reviews.response: We are very glad you enoyed your stay, and that our recomendations were helpful! We hope to see you again in town soon and hang out more guys! :)

reviews.comments:
BA is a huge city but composed of neighborhoods. Palermo is the neighborhood to be in; great local color, connections to public transportation, shopping, parks, etc. We stayed at this terrific cozy apartment with our favorite spot on Martin's balcony and planned our next day while sipping on a cold beer and watching life in BA take place. BTW, we rented here for two weeks- it was our home. 
We appreciate the firm queen-size bed for a good sleep and two satellite channels in English (BBC and CNN). Two blocks is the DISCO supermarket for any cooking needs and a laundry only 3 blocks up Malibia for drop off at $3.50 US a load. What more can anyone ask for when looking for a home base to enjoy this wonderful city. 
Look no further, just book it.

Actually one word would do for the whole list of items to be commented on: "great"!  Martin and Natalia are great hosts, who are readily available for questions and are helpful in identifying spots to go to.  The flat is in a terrific location, in a very lively neighbourhood but the location allows for a real intimate neighbourhood feeling so that one can make friends with people (as we were able to do within our two week stay). This barrio mirrors the big city in terms of food, style, music, dancing, clubbing, and attitude ... .  The whole experience is rounded off by the openess and friendliness of the people in Argentina.  One caveat though:  the more one makes an effort to speak Spanish, the better - no need to be perfect, but the effort is worth the result - whilst many people speak at least a bit of English, they really appreciate your effort ... .
The apartment is in a great area of Palermo, though we found it a bit noisy at night when the bars closed. Natalia was very helpful, and their recommendations were excellent.

Martin and Natalia where the perfect hosts - there on our arrival and always available by phone ..... Suggestions on where to eat locally -(all spot on). Fabulous area in a wonderful city 
Thanks

The place looks as described and is a great spot for sightseeing. We absolutely LOVED the neighborhood, so recommend the location. Martin was very responsive and although he couldn't meet us at check-in, was very helpful and easy to work with. Great stay!
reviews.response: Thank you Lauren!!!

reviews.comments: Even though I arrived late he waited and showed me everything and gave me tips. The apt is super nice & comfortable and the location is great.
reviews.response: Thank you Juan!!!!! having you was great!

reviews.comments:
Had a 2 night stay in Martin and Natalia's lovely unit in Palermo. Location was spot on in a safe neighbourhood - there are so many fabulous boutiques and restaurants nearby! The unit is spacious, clean and well fitted out. Would have loved to have stayed here longer to make more use of what the apartment has to offer. 
Martin and Natalia were so helpful and attentive. They were very accomodating for a late check in and assisted in booking a taxi for an early morning departure.
reviews.response: Thanks Leigh!!!! :)

reviews.comments: Great place in heart of Palermo, and great hosts! We really enjoyed our stay here and hope to come back soon.
reviews.response: Thank you Alex! Hope to see you back soon!

reviews.comments: Cosy, modernly furnished apartment in a great location! Conveniently located subway and supermarket all within walking distance. Martin was easy to communicate with and made sure all was going well with the apartment. We stayed during the weekend which we found could get noisy from the street below however this will only affect a light sleeper. Overall the apartment was perfectly suited for our weekend away in Buenos Aires.

首先,在還沒見面的時候,Martin 就回覆的相當快,因為我們這趟旅程也有用Airbnb 訂了另外兩個地方,就有比較性

酒店的地理位置也相當清楚,當然順利的就見面了,小倆口人相當好,周圍也介紹的非常詳細;地理位置也相當棒,四個街口就到地鐵站;房子內部也是超級棒,應有盡有,床也是很舒服,真的很想多留幾天

當然,有朋友要到布宜諾斯艾利斯,絕對推薦的
reviews.response: Thanks so much guys!!!

reviews.comments:
Martin and Natalia were congenial hosts; kind, and energetic, they did their best to make me feel at home in their apartment and they addressed all my concerns.  Stylish and modern, the apartment looks exactly as it's described. I found it very comfortable during my week's stay. 
Palermo is one of the most interesting neighborhoods in the world, lovely architecture, picturesque streets, and many offerings.  I love staying there.
There are grocery stores across the street of the apartment and the subway station, along with large parks are only a couple of blocks away. 
 I give Martin and Natalia my highest recommendation and I would definitely stay there during my next trip.
reviews.response: Thanks Greg!!! having you was great!!!!!!!

reviews.comments: Martin and Natalia were amazing hosts! Extremely responsive and the apartment is perfect for a couple or solo traveler. Neighborhood is the best - residential but close to great restaurants and transportation. It's a busy street though, so may need to bring noise cancelers for a good night sleep!
reviews.response: Thanks Gillea!!!!

reviews.comments: Martin foi extremamente atencioso, disponível o tempo todo. O apartamento é muito bom, exatamente como mostram as fotos. A localização é excelente, com tudo por perto, restaurantes, supermercados, metrô, (URL HIDDEN) certeza ficaria novamente.
reviews.response: Thanks so much Elisa!!

reviews.comments: Martin's apartment cannot be more well located. It is at the heart of Palermo-Soho which is a very charming part of town full of restaurants , cafes and nightclubs (boliches). The apartment itself is perfect for a couple. It has  separate bathroom and bedroom and a comfortable real bed. It does have a full kitchen with everything one needs for cooking which we did not have to use  provided the abundance of affordable restauntants and cafes in the neighborhood.  Martin was very accommodation and let us check in at 1:00 PM. I did not meet him in person but he was always available via mail and IM.  He also was available with great recommendations about places to see and visit.
reviews.response: It was great having you!!! thank you Felipe!

reviews.comments:
Le logement est  bien situé dans un quartier tranquille et vivant à la fois qui ne manque pas de  charme et de très  bonnes adresses  pour se restaurer.  Le métro  est à  10 minutes à  pied et le centre (plaza  de mayo) facilement accessible.  L'appartement  (literie, serviettes, etc.) était propre et bien équipé. Enfin, notre hôte,  Martin, était disponible pour répondre à toutes nos questions.
Une très  bonne adresse pour poser ses bagages et visiter Buenos Aires en toute tranquillité.
Yann & Frédérique.

This flat was a perfect base for exploring BA (metro, buses and loads of lovely bars and restaurants nearby). Martin gave us some great advise on places to go and was always very responsive if we had any questions. I have nothing but good things to say about the flat. It was clean and beautifully decorated with a well stocked kitchen. We very comfortably slept three (two in a double and a really comfy futon). We would definitely stay here again if I was back in BA. Thanks Martin!
reviews.response:
Thanks Jo!! I´m really happy that you liked my advises, especially "Lo de Roberto"
So sad I couldn't meet you even though I tried.!!!

reviews.comments: Excelente lugar! Bairro extremamente agradável, apartamento honesto com o que propôs a oferecer. Anfitrião disponível e confiável. Até a próxima vez.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias José! un placer haberte recibido

reviews.comments:
We couldn’t have been happier with how Martin treated us and how comfortable we stayed at his apartment. We met with him personally the night we arrived and he was very helpful and approachable. He gave us a few recommendations and gave us a pretty good insight of the city (it was our first time in Buenos Aires). The apartment was as expected. No surprises. Great location. Plenty of places in the vicinity. We felt very safe . I’d definitely recommend staying at Martin’s place.

No podríamos estar más satisfechos con el trato que Martín tuvo con nosotros y que tan cómodos nos sentimos quedándonos en su departamento. Nos encontramos con él en persona la noche que llegamos y fue bastante predispuesto a ayudarnos y nos trató con mucha cercanía. Nos dió unas cuantas recomendaciones y en general, una buena idea de la ciudad (primera vez en BAires para nosotros). El departamento fue lo que anticipamos. Ninguna sorpresa. Excelente ubicación. Una gran variedad de lugares a la redonda. Nos sentimos bastante seguros en el vecindario. Definitivamente recomendaría quedarse en el departamento de Martin.
reviews.response: MUCHAS GRACIAS Alonso!!!! fueron geniales!
